title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
fullTitle: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia (TV Series 2005â€“ )

episodes.title: The Gang Finds a Dumpster Baby
episodes.plot: Mac and Dee decide to raise a baby they find in the dumpster. Dennis talks some trash while going green and befriending radical environmentalist groups, while Charlie and Frank go dumpster-diving.

episodes.title: The Gang Gets Invincible
episodes.plot: Dennis, Mac, and Dee take part in the Philadelphia Eagles' open tryouts, while Frank drops acid and freaks out when he and Charlie tailgate next to the McPoyles.

episodes.title: Dennis and Dee's Mom Is Dead
episodes.plot: After Dennis and Dee's gold-digging mother dies from a botched plastic-surgery operation, Dee and Frank scheme to get their name in the will, while Dennis inherits the house and makes plans for a party mansion.

episodes.title: The Gang Gets Held Hostage
episodes.plot: The McPoyle brothers and sister Margaret take the gang hostage at Paddy's, raising the stakes to a new level in the feud between the two groups.

episodes.title: The Aluminum Monster vs. Fatty Magoo
episodes.plot: Dee discovers that the biggest loser and fatty from high school is now a successful and thin fashion designer... now making Dee the biggest loser.

episodes.title: The Gang Solves the North Korea Situation
episodes.plot: As they prepare for the annual Pub Crawl, the gang is horrified to learn that they face competition from a new Korean bar.

episodes.title: The Gang Sells Out
episodes.plot: A corporate chain offers to buy the Paddy's Pub, leaving Dee and Charlie unemployed and forcing them to find jobs at another restaurant, where they abuse their positions and take advantage of the manager, who is Dee's friend.

episodes.title: Frank Sets Sweet Dee on Fire
episodes.plot: In their quest to become famous, Frank, Charlie, and Mac, search for newsworthy footage to air on public access.

episodes.title: Sweet Dee's Dating a Retarded Person
episodes.plot: While Dennis and Dee try to figure out if the rapper Dee is dating has a mental handicap or not, Charlie, Mac, and Frank try to start their own band without knowledge of how to play musical instruments.

episodes.title: Mac Is a Serial Killer
episodes.plot: After reading that a serial killer is on the loose, the gang notices that Mac is acting shady and decides to find out if he's the man behind the murders.

episodes.title: Dennis Looks Like a Registered Sex Offender
episodes.plot: Dennis is angry because he's being mistaken for a fat guy rather than the sex offender who moved next door to Charlie. Meanwhile, Mac's father is released from prison and he and Mac have some catching up to do.

episodes.title: The Gang Gets Whacked: Part 1
episodes.plot: After stumbling upon a kilo of cocaine, the gang is forced to pay off a $25,000 debt to the mob. Mac becomes a mob informant, while Frank pimps out Dennis as an escort at the local country club. Charlie stumbles upon an opportunity to sell illegal narcotics.

episodes.title: The Gang Gets Whacked: Part 2
episodes.plot: While paying off their debt to the mob, Charlie and Dee try to find a way to make fake cocaine in order to fool them, while Dennis ranks in thousands of dollars being pimped out at the local country club. Mac realizes his position as a mob informant isn't being utilized to its full potential.

episodes.title: Bums: Making a Mess All Over the City
episodes.plot: Dee and Mac become Guardian Angels and clean up the streets when a bum starts using the alley behind the bar to masturbate. Meanwhile, Dennis, Charlie, and Frank impersonate police officers in order to get preferential treatment.

episodes.title: The Gang Dances Their Asses Off
episodes.plot: After Charlie accidentally puts Paddy's Pub up for 1st prize in a local dance competition, Frank makes the gang participate in the contest. Here, they form alliances and try to cheat the other contestants, as well as themselves, out of first place.
